Header: 6098 Army Absentees Seek Discharge During Amnesty
Content: A total of 7 Officers and 6091 Other Rankers of the Army who are considered as Absent Without Official Leave (AWOL) have reported to Army formations by Wednesday (12) evening at the end of the week-long (5 - 12 February) general amnesty declared by HE the President account of 72 National Independence day. Upon reaching respective formations, across the country, necessary legal formalities will be underway at respective formations. In addition, absentees of the Navy and Air Force during the same period have also reported to their respective formations.
